amendment.description: To improve the capacity of the United States Border Patrol to rapidly respond to threats to border security.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3999 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 3999 proposed by Senator Kerry. (consideration: CR S4603-4605) To improve the capacity of the United States Border Patrol to rapidly respond to threats to border security.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3999 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3999 proposed by Senator Kerry.
